frontmatter.title: A redesign of the Kien app made it possible to have more overview and control over the flexible Kien speakers
frontmatter.intro: I made a UX project out of making my own UX design portfolio website. Firstly, I did not want to use templates, because they are not always ux friendly and also not authentic. In addition, I wanted to further practice my ux skills and making my own website was the perfect idea for this. Ultimately, of course, I also wanted to show what I can do and who I am to possible future employers.
